title: Racism
body: I really just wanna get though 5 games in a row without somebody being called a %%%%%%... is that too much to ask?

replies.body: It's pretty bad when you have to deal with all the inappropriate language being thrown around sometimes, but you can always help us find those that need action taken by remembering to report them in post game! We don't actively monitor every single game with human eyes (as that would be nigh impossible) but if you report them those logs will be sent our way.

so if a player is name calling and it gets reported but the reported player gets more people to report the victim what exactly happens in the algorithm? because i have been seeing endless mistakes in the algorithm detecting nuances in the english language where things another player says, just worded the right way, completely goes under the radar and the victim of verbal abuse who defends themselves gets banned and i see more and more players taking advantage of this, what is riot going to do to protect people from players like this?
its becoming a serious problem... (6-7 out of 10 games played something like this happens at least from my experience)
do i have to only play ranked forever to avoid this crap or what?
like seriously its getting ridiculous at this point, i come on league to unload stress from work, i really dont need people harassing teammates in the place i try and escape toxicity and stress
and also, i wanna know how im a problem in game in any way because i dont like being on the receiving end and i sure hope to god i dont do it to anyone else

but nobody responds well to harsh criticism from strangers, and when i say harsh,  i mean literally so harsh im surprised there hasnt been a lawsuit against riot due to somebody killing themselves....
